name: COVID19ICD10CMValueSetForSickleBetaThalassemia
title: COVID19 ICD10CM Value Set for Sickle Beta Thalassemia
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to sickle cell beta thalassemia (Hb S/Beta Th) and is listed as a blood disorder/hemoglobinopathy on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes sickle cell beta thalassemia (Hb S/Beta Th) and sickle cell-delta beta-thalassemia.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes HbSS disease.)
